action.action-desc: Ms. Esty (for herself, Mr. Gibson, Mr. Larson of Connecticut, and Ms. DeLauro) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend expensing of environmental remediation costs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Brownfields Redevelopment Tax Incentive Reauthorization Act of 2015.

section.header: Extension of expensing of environmental remediation costs

subsection.text: Section 198(h) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking December 31, 2011 and inserting December 31, 2019.
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall apply to expenditures paid or incurred after December 31, 2011.
